seriesStmt.title: Wright American Fiction: An Electronic Collection

projectDesc.p: This text was created as part of a project by the Committee on Institutional Cooperation. Project description and participants are available at the project website at http://www.letrs.indiana.edu/wright.

editorialDecl.p: This electronic text file was created by Optical Character Recognition (OCR), and has been encoding and edited using the recommendations for Level 4 of the TEI in Libraries Guidelines. Digital page images are linked to the text file.

revisionDesc.change: Finished OCR, rough encoding and error checking
Converted doc from sgml to TEI P5. Inserted OCR text. Linked image files
Mass transformation to fix page breaks, update schema, and update project information.
